item.title: Pantone's 2025 color is Mocha Mousse: How the company sold color to the world
item.description: Pantone isn't the only color system of its kind. But thanks to an innovative founder and savvy marketing, it's become the industry standard.

item.title: Syrian opposition forces enter the strategic city of Hama
item.description: Syrian rebels have entered another major city, in a further blow to President Bashar Assad after they took over Aleppo days earlier.
